cgcloud__Job_Definition_List_Product__c.name: cgcloud__Job_Definition_List_Product__c
cgcloud__Job_Definition_List_Product__c.description: Stores the details of the relationship between the Job Definition List and Product related lists.

cgcloud__Composite_Key__c.description: Contains concatenation of the Job Definition List and Product related records. The field is set by workflow. This field prevents a Product from being added twice to a Job Definition List.

cgcloud__Excluded__c.description: The product can be temporarily excluded from the product list.

cgcloud__Manually__c.description: Added products are marked as Manually True. Products that are added via FSA are marked as Manually False.

cgcloud__Product_Description__c.description: Shows the description of the product.

cgcloud__Product_Number__c.description: Shows the number of the product.

cgcloud__Sales_Org__c.description: Sales organization to which the product assignment of the activity (and the activity itself) belongs.
